import React from"react";import{useSortable}from"@dnd-kit/sortable";import{CSS}from"@dnd-kit/utilities";import"./SortableItem.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function SortableItem(_ref){let{id,title,valor,onDelete,incrementValor,decrementValor,baseHeight=35,overlay=false}=_ref;const{attributes,listeners,setNodeRef,transform,transition}=useSortable({id});const style={transform:CSS.Transform.toString(transform),transition:transition,background:overlay?"#e0e0e0":"#f2f2f3",height:`${baseHeight*valor}px`// height depends on hours
};const handleDeleteClick=e=>{e.stopPropagation();if(onDelete)onDelete(id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:setNodeRef,style:style,className:"task",...attributes,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-left",...listeners,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"drag-handle",children:"\u22EE\u22EE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"task-title",children:title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>decrementValor(id),className:"task-btn",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"task-hours",children:[valor,"h"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>incrementValor(id),className:"task-btn",children:"+"}),onDelete&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteClick,className:"task-btn delete-btn",title:"Delete",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"})]})]});}
